text: hi everyone today is a quick recipe for
popular dessert in showers Asia you can
fire this dessert in Malaysia Indonesia
Singapore Thailand Vietnam etc basically
is a kind of short noodle in green color
look like warms it's like jelly and
we're gonna eat that with sugar syrup
sometimes with mung bean paste red beans
or coconut toppings let's begin
cementec chili you need a special flower
you can either use mung beans - like
this one or water chestnuts - so in this
small pot I dissolve the mung beans -
water sugar and pandan extract store
really well and cook under a medium low
heat keep stirring until you feel quite
heavy at the bottom of the pot you will
see the stature start being cooked and
it sticks to the whisk lower the heat
and continue whisking until you get a
smooth paste like this keep whisking and
whisking and whisking for one to two
more minutes when the pace look white
translucent that means it's cooked then
quickly transfer the mixture into the
potato ricer the tool I'm using is
called potato Rice's or baby food
strainer you can buy it in a supermarket
in the kitchen where session Walmart
IKEA or amazon also habits
underneath the potato ricer I have
prepared a bowl of very cold water then
just slightly press the potato ricer to
release the dough into those more of
water put a lot of ice cubes in the
water to make sure that it is icing call
it will prevent the jelly to stick to
each other and stay in that shape
oh they look like warmth but delicious
warmth so prepare one glass of shaved
ice or cross ice adding the jelly and

mung bean paste or red beans when I just
give it simple today to make the sugar
syrup you just dissolve the sugar water
and a pinch of salt
under medium-low heat until dissolved
and then let cool same for the coconut
topping you just make coconut milk sugar
a little bit salt or tapioca starch and
stir until dissolved and go under
